# Tornado Welcome Template

Responsive, animated landing page for Tornado projects generated by Projex CLI.

## Colors
- Primary: `#2B5B84`
- Secondary: `#4A90E2`
- Accent: `#5DADE2`
- Background: Light `#FAFBFC` / Dark `#0E1621`

## Integration
Use `make_app()` (see `integration.py`) with handlers for `/` and `/api`.

## Customize
- Swap icons and feature text
- Adjust CSS variables in `:root`
